subject: Trades (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks did not do anything rash or imprudent ahead of Thursday’s trade deadline. At the same time, they did nothing to improve their roster, and that might be a problem.
snippet: The Knicks did not do anything rash or imprudent ahead of Thursday’s trade deadline. At the same time, they did nothing to improve their roster, and that might be a problem.
